  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class FileController
extends org.zkoss.zul.Window
    Controller for the config. Creates the window and all its components.
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:

        user - username for the authenticated user.
        helper - helper to execute jobs.

        InterruptedException - if the window cannot be created.

        Get the different types of configuration files for a DB type.
        Parameters:
        dbType - type of the DB to get the configuration file from.
        Returns:
        a combobox with the different configuration files, and their paths.
